Package mygame.game

Class GameSettings

java.lang.Object
mygame.game.GameSettings
public class GameSettings
extends java.lang.Object
Class that represents GameSettings, which defines global game settings

  • Constructor Details

    • GameSettings

      public GameSettings​(double portalConquestPoints, double portalChargingPoints, double connectorPlayerChargingPoints, double playerNavigatePoints, double pointsY)
      Constructor for the GameSettings class
      Parameters:
      portalConquestPoints - experience points to earn by conquering a Portal
      portalChargingPoints - experience points to charge by conquering a Portal
      connectorPlayerChargingPoints - experience points to earn by charging a Player in a Connector
      playerNavigatePoints - experience points to earn by moving a Player to another location of the map
